text: meya ma therum gath aanathma awabodhayayi.bududahame igenwena paradi 'mama' yanu wiyuktha wuwak nowe..eeya sthira nowu kriyawaliyak prathipalayak pamanibudda darshanaye bhawaya yanu upadanaya nisa hata ganna thathwayayi...kama bhawa,rupa bhawa ha arupa bhawa yanuwen eya thun wadaruma we....kese namuth 'nama' yanuwen mulin wisthara karana lada de sathuwa aththatama pawathmak adda nathinam eya hudek manase nirmanada yana prashana pilbadawa ( wasthawika yatharthaya ) pilbadawa wiwida darshana thalaye wiwadayan pawathi, udaharanayak lesa nagarjuna himiyan siyalu de manase nirmanayan bawath sabawa 'shunyak' bawath deshana kara atha.

manawasinhayan liyu githa bohoya. 1956 bandaranayaka mahatha balayata pathkirimata lankadipaya ha ekwa kriya kaleya. 1964 sapthambar 28 wana dina lankadipaye mul pituwe ‘lekhakayata barapathalayi’ mayen chandrarathna manawasinhayange seyaruwak samaga ohu kolambaa maha rohale prathikara labana bawa palawiya.
